document_data.name: Headless Serpent, Secret Venom
document_data.mainbody: '''Headless Serpent, Secret Venom''' was a gang from the port town of [[Nyanzaru]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]], [[southwest Faer√ªn]], active sometime before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Headless Serpent, Secret Venom was opposed by several [[monk]]s, including [[Kimigha Poji]], [[Roahton Mobar]], and [[Strigga Morkoscavich]], some years before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. The monks wore magical garbs known as ''[[The Graceful Cloth]]'', ''[[The Mighty Cloth]]'', and ''[[vest of soul rejuvenation]]'', making them a serious threat to the Port Nyanzaru gang.
